greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter sequence combining A003557(n) [n divided by largest squarefree divisor of n] with A319697(n) [sum of even squarefree divisors of n].
comment: Restricted growth sequence transform of ordered pair [A003557(n), A319697(n)].
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
A003557(n) = { my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 2] = f[i, 2]-1); factorback(f); }; \\ From A003557
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 31 2018
